channel.title: Forgotten-simplicity PERFECT SPECS/DICING/24/7/PK/ECO/AND MORE!
channel.description:
****Please not some may not like the "Blue" back ground when you logg into the server.... Please follow this link to the forums page to get rid of it! [url=http://forgottensimplicity.freeforums.org/get-rid-of-the-ugly-blue-background-on-your-client-t21.html]http://forgottensimplicity.freeforums.org/get-rid-of-the-ugly-blue-background-on-your-client-t21.html[/url] *******************
Forgotten-Simplicity is a pk/Economy based server. There will be many updates along the way to make the server the best that it can possiably be! Forgotten-Simplicity is in the Beta stage at the moment while I find and fix all the remaining bugs left. I will be making daily and weekly updates depending on the importance of them! I am currently working on finding all dupes and or bugs in the server! Here is the link to the downloadable client for now!!! [url=http://uppit.com/b42nu6ffbioc/Server_Jar.rar]Download Server.Jar.rar @ UppIT[/url]
Forums page - [url=http://forgottensimplicity.freeforums.org/index.php]forgottensimplicity.freeforums.org • Index page[/url]
Some of the features that are on the server now include the following. 24/7 VPS! No lagg at all! Fully working special attacks! Including claws, Korasi, Ags, And Vls! Fully working slayer system! Withe the option to get a easier task! Fully working pvp with drop and EP! Almost every skill is FULLY working!! Fully working barrows! Fuling working nex armors! steadfast,ragefire and glavin boots! Fulling working CONSTRUCTION! Fully working bon fires! Fully working slayer tower! Fully working curses! Fully working dice bag for Dice rank! Brand new custom home! Brand new donator zone! New dice zone! Over 20+ bosses! including Nex, Corp, Arma, Bandos ect!! Fully working GWD! There is lots more so come check it out!!
Some features that will be added or fixed! Add in more donator options! Add in SOF! Fix dungeoneering! Add in High scores! And much more as I find bugs and issues!
THERE ARE STAFF SPOTS ARE OPEN AS WELL!
Mind you this is a brand new server so there will not be many players on at first!!
Some daily updates will include the following: Fix all the bugs that are found! Work on adding new items! Some others just can't think of them at the moment!
Some items that will be added through out a week span: High scores! SOF! Add in quests! Add in Bank tabs! Add in Clue scrolls! Some others as well. just a brief description!
Come play and have some fun! Very laid back staff and players! Hope to see you on!

Forgotten-Simplicity is a pk/Economy based server.
There will be many updates along the way to make the server the best that it can possiably be!
Forgotten-Simplicity is in the Beta stage at the moment while I find and fix all the remaining bugs left.
I will be making daily and weekly updates depending on the importance of them!
I am currently working on finding all dupes and or bugs in the server!
Here is the link to the downloadable client for now!!!
Download Server.Jar.rar @ UppIT

Forums page - forgottensimplicity.freeforums.org • Index page

Some of the features that are on the server now include the following.
24/7 VPS!
No lagg at all!
Fully working special attacks! Including claws, Korasi, Ags, And Vls!
Fully working slayer system! Withe the option to get a easier task!
Fully working pvp with drop and EP!
Almost every skill is FULLY working!!
Fully working barrows!
Fuling working nex armors!
steadfast,ragefire and glavin boots!

Fully working bon fires!
Fully working slayer tower!
Fully working curses!
Fully working dice bag for Dice rank!
Brand new custom home!
Brand new donator zone!
New dice zone!
Over 20+ bosses! including Nex, Corp, Arma, Bandos ect!!
Fully working GWD!
There is lots more so come check it out!!

Some features that will be added or fixed!
Add in more donator options!
Add in SOF!
Fix dungeoneering!
Add in High scores!
And much more as I find bugs and issues!

THERE ARE STAFF SPOTS ARE OPEN AS WELL!

Mind you this is a brand new server so there will not be many players on at first!!

Some daily updates will include the following:
Fix all the bugs that are found!
Work on adding new items!
Some others just can’t think of them at the moment!

Some items that will be added through out a week span:

SOF!

Some others as well.
just a brief description!

Come play and have some fun! Very laid back staff and players!
